title: Everything You Need to Know about the Capricorn Aquarius Cusp

steps.title: Born between January 17-22, this cusp is driven and creative.
steps.content: Born between January 17-22, this cusp is driven and creative. Nicknamed the Cusp of Mystery and Imagination, this sign combines the opposing energies of grounded and disciplined Capricorn with idealistic and unpredictable Aquarius. These contrasting traits give the Capricorn Aquarius cusp a unique outlook, creative edge, and alluring air like no other sign. With Capricorn’s raw ambition and Aquarius’ innovative spirit, this cusp is a visionary achiever who makes their big dreams a reality. [1] X Research source This cusp’s mysterious energy comes from their planetary rulers. Capricorn is ruled by Saturn, the planet of discipline and responsibility, while Aquarius is ruled by Uranus, the planet of progress, originality, and rebellion. Each sign’s element also makes this cusp intriguing. Capricorn is an earth sign who is practical, stable, and logical while Aquarius is an air sign who is analytical, clever, and social. Some people born at the end of Capricorn season or the beginning of Aquarius season feel like they don’t fit their sign. This is because they were born during the signs’ transition and share traits with both Caps and Aquas! If you’re unsure whether you’re a cusp or not, Stina Garbis, psychic astrologer, advises “ having your chart done to verify your sign.”

steps.title: Ambitious
steps.content: Ambitious A Capricorn Aquarius cusp is laser-focused on making their future better and brighter. The combination of Capricorn’s drive and disciplined work ethic with Aquarius’ forward-thinking mindset and curiosity makes them a thinker and a doer. This cusp dreams up lofty goals for themselves, puts their aspirations on paper, and actually achieves them! [2] X Research source This cusp’s ambitious energy stems from their mixed modalities. Capricorn is a cardinal sign who initiates projects with their boundless ambition. Aquarius is a stable and persistent fixed sign who ensures their projects get completed. These signs are also great networkers who advance far in their careers. Aquarius’ social nature inspires career-oriented Capricorn to meet and connect with the right people to get them to the top.

steps.title: Creative
steps.content: Creative With Capricorn and Aquarius’ contrasting traits, this cusp has a completely unique perspective. They see inventive solutions and colorful possibilities where others see problems. While this cusp spends a lot of time with their head in the clouds, Capricorn’s practicality tends to ground Aquarius’ dreaminess. So, they express their creativity in tangible ways, like painting, writing, and building. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Idealistic
steps.content: Idealistic If there’s one thing a Capricorn Aquarius cusp is after, it’s making the world a better place. With Capricorn’s great sense of responsibility and Aquarius’ social justice spirit, these cusps are true humanitarians. They put their time and energy into helping others, whether they’re on the front lines building homes for people in need, raising money for causes, or educating others about injustices. [4] X Research source A Capricorn Aquarius cusp can look serious and reserved on the outside, but on the inside, they’re big softies. They have huge hearts and are deeply empathetic. Capricorn helps reign in Aquarius’ bold and eccentric nature, helping this cusp enact change that’s progressive and doesn’t alienate others.

steps.title: Reliable
steps.content: Reliable If a friend, family member, or stranger is in need, a Capricorn Aquarius cusp is always there for them. Aquarians are incredibly intellectual and analytical, so they’re always down to help others work through their problems. Coupled with Capricorn’s deep sense of loyalty and commitment, this cusp is incredibly supportive and generous. The combined earth and air signs make this cusp trustworthy and friendly. Capricorn’s earthy nature makes them dependable and stable while Aquarius’ airy spirit makes them social and communicative.

steps.title: Entertaining
steps.content: Entertaining Witty jokes, sarcastic remarks, and deadpan deliveries are second nature to a Capricorn Aquarius cusp. These cusps are great conversationalists and storytellers who easily keep friends and lovers captivated and entertained. With Capricorn’s dark, self-deprecating humor and Aquarius’ zany theories, you never know what’s going to come out of their mouth! [5] X Research source

steps.title: Detached
steps.content: Detached Because Capricorn Aquarius cusps like to spend their time dreaming up ideas and accomplishing their goals, they can come off as aloof and even selfish to their friends and family. While they care deeply for others, they can forget to keep in touch with their loved ones and tend to disregard pleasant small talk with acquaintances. [6] X Research source If you’re a Capricorn Aquarius cusp, make time in your busy schedule to check in with your family and friends. For instance, send them a daily text, ask them to hang out during the week, or plan monthly video calls.

steps.title: Judgmental
steps.content: Judgmental A Capricorn Aquarius cusp’s fierce ambition often comes with very high standards. They just want things to go according to their vision and plan, so they can be critical and nitpicky with their friends, partner, and coworkers. [7] X Research source If you find yourself judging and criticizing others, pause and focus on the positives of the situation. Acknowledging someone’s strengths and accepting that mistakes sometimes happen can help you stop being critical. [8] X Research source

steps.title: This cusp is compatible with Aries, Leo, and Sagittarius.
steps.content: This cusp is compatible with Aries, Leo, and Sagittarius. These passionate fire signs are drawn to a Capricorn Aquarius cusp’s ambition and captivated by their unique way of looking at the world. Aries, Leo, and Sagittarius seek out thrills and adventures, so they love that this cusp keeps them on their toes. The fire signs help ignite this cusp’s drive while inspiring them to open up emotionally, too. The air signs of Libra and Gemini also make great matches for this cusp. They can keep up with this cusp’s quick thoughts and intellectual conversations and don’t bat an eye at their radical ideas.

steps.title: This cusp is attracted to independent and passionate people.
steps.content: This cusp is attracted to independent and passionate people. A Capricorn Aquarius cusp loves their freedom, so they’re drawn to potential partners who respect their space to be creative and follow their dreams. If the person they have their eye on is also imaginative, has their own passion in life, and can keep up a stimulating conversation, this cusp is smitten! [9] X Research source In the bedroom, this cusp loves to experiment and keep things fresh and exciting. They like to get creative between the sheets, whether they’re trying out new positions, fantasies, or toys. Both Capricorn and Aquarius can be slow to open up. If you want this sign to know you’re interested, psychic astrologer Stina Garbis recommends to “start by befriending [them]. Show interest in [their] topics of study and ask [them] to explain some of [their] ideas to you.” To keep this independent cusp interested, Stina Garbis advises to “maintain a life of your own to prove that you are a high quality, self-sufficient and confident person.”
